title: Who Destroyed Nord Stream 2? With Benny Johnson, Jack Posobiec and Erik Fox
itunes:title: Who Destroyed Nord Stream 2? With Benny Johnson, Jack Posobiec and Erik Fox
description:
On this breaking news edition of The Charlie Kirk Show as Hurricane Ian bares down on Florida's East Coast Charlie brings YOU live coverage from the center of the storm. First Weather Nation's Field Correspondent, Erik Fox joins the program from inside the eye of Hurricane Ian and predicts what will happen next. Next, TPUSA Contributor, Benny Johnson, brings live updates from the Tampa Bay with play by play coverage of how the hurricane has sucked nearly all the water from the shore of that city—an eery indication that the subsequent surge of water will be devastating. Lastly, Charlie welcomes host of Human Events Daily, Jack Posobiec, to break down who sabotaged Nord Stream 2, and their answers might surprise you. Cui bono? Who stands to benefit from such an act of industrial terrorism?

 

Support the show: http://www.charliekirk.com/support

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
